title: Enhanced Work Item Details & Rich Content Display

changes.description: Added comprehensive work item details panel showing type-specific fields (Description, Acceptance Criteria, Repro Steps, Design, Discussions)
Implemented rich text field component with collapsible sections for HTML content from Azure DevOps
Added dynamic discussions/comments fetching from Azure DevOps comments API
Expanded Related Items to show parent, child, and related work items (not just children)
Added navigation history with Back button for browsing through related work items
Added Tags section displaying work item tags as styled badges
Increased default Details Panel width to 45% of screen for better content viewing
Updated Details Panel max width to 70% of screen (from fixed 800px)
Redesigned Back button with modern outline style and smooth hover animations
Work item fields now always render even when empty, showing 'No content provided'
Add indicator to profile icon
Added collapsible Unscheduled Items section in agenda view for better space management
Added resizable Details Panel - drag the left edge to adjust width (300-800px)
Added resizable Unscheduled Items list - drag the right edge to adjust width (200-600px)
Work item tags are now properly fetched and displayed
Improved panel resize experience with visual feedback on hover
Added due date change history tracking with reason logging
Added related items view for PBIs and TBIs
Support for QA Complete Date and Target Date fields
Epic progress visualization with child items tracking
Advanced filtering by iteration, work item type, assignee, and state
Search functionality for unscheduled items
Collapsible unscheduled items sidebar
Improved calendar performance with optimized rendering
Calendar view for visualizing work items by due date
Azure DevOps integration for PBIs, TBIs, Epics, Features, and Bugs
Drag and drop to schedule/unschedule items
Work item details panel with inline editing
Cycle time analytics and developer statistics
